summary: a statistical framework was developed to characterize influenza surveillance systems. ad hoc systems developed in response to the pandemic flu outbreak are more correlated with the information environment than others. supplementary material is available to authorized users. additional file 1: Supplementary materials including data sources, data preparation, model selection, sensitivity analysis and results of posterior distribution in table format. additional file 2: OpenBUGS codes for the final pandemic and non-pandemic model.
